string-array.name: Descriptors
string-array.item: A lesson on the most basic elements of java, and a look at how they make a program function.
A look at the two types of comments, and the uses of each one.
The first look into Data types starting with the four integer types: int, short, long, and byte.
Two data types with different uses in mind, these data types handle fractional numbers!
A look at how to initialize and use the integer and floating data types

string-array.name: prompts
string-array.item: Try writing - System.out.print(“Hello World”) - below and see what happens!
Try using a comment in your code!
Try initializing an int and printing it using - System.out.print();
